metaDescription: Find top-rated financial advisors in Minot. Expert guidance for retirement planning, wealth management, and investment strategies.

heroDescription: Minot, North Dakota, known as the Magic City, is a vibrant community with a rich history and diverse economy.
landscapeDescription: Minot's economy is driven by agriculture, healthcare, and energy sectors. The city is experiencing steady growth, supported by its strategic location and infrastructure.
uniqueNeeds: Minot requires tailored financial advice due to its unique economic landscape and population dynamics.
citySpecificRiskAdvice: Minot's reliance on agriculture and energy poses risks; diversify investments. Real estate may face volatility from economic shifts and weather events like floods.

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Minot's economy grew by 3.2% last year, driven by energy and agriculture sectors.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics
sections.description: According to Census (2023), the median income in Minot is approximately $60,000, reflecting the city's diverse job market.

sections.title: Advisor Specializations
sections.description: Based on BLS (2023), financial advisors in Minot increasingly focus on agriculture and energy sectors, adapting to local economic needs.

sections.title: Cost of Living
sections.description: According to BLS (2024), Minot's cost of living is lower than the national average, making it an attractive place for families.

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), Minot's real estate market is stable, with moderate price increases and a healthy inventory.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Minot's business climate is favorable, with incentives for startups and established businesses alike.
